thread.title: Minnesota Vikings have quietly become legitimate NFC contender - NFL
thread.title_full: Minnesota Vikings have quietly become legitimate NFC contender - NFL - SI.com

author: Doug Farrar
title: Minnesota Vikings have quietly become legitimate NFC contender - NFL
text:
by Doug Farrar Twitter Email Posted: Sun Oct. 25, 2015 Perhaps it was their 7-9 record last year, or the fact that they haven't made the playoffs since 2012. Or, maybe people stopped taking them seriously when the moribund 49ers beat them 20-3 in the 2015 season opener. Whatever the reason, the Vikings aren't often talked about as a postseason contender this season, and that could be a mistake. After their 28-19 win over the Lions on Sunday, Mike Zimmer 's team is now 4-2, and the only loss since that embarrassing opener came to the unbeaten Broncos by a 23-20 score on Oct. 5. The Vikings have been in every game, and things are starting to heat up on both sides of the ball.
NFL AFC South's horrific start could mean big changes ahead for all four teams by Chris Burke
